ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend
ygData.msgSnippet: Well today a necro friend GAVE me a blackened crystalline robe since I was wearing crystalline and could use the extra CHA on the blackened one.  That was very
ygData.messageBody:
Well today a necro friend GAVE me a blackened crystalline robe since I was
wearing crystalline and could use the extra CHA on the blackened one.  That
was very very very kind of him.  LOL  When you get high enough, he might not
need repaid but you could pass on the gesture and help someone who needs it.  

Lena


What is the nicest thing someone has done for you in game?

A friend of mine has been showing me the ropes of EQ and, when I get
high enough, I want to repay him for his kindness.  Looking for ideas.

Thanks all.

Lizz ~
